shortdesc.ph: Selects the audio tracks that you want to play on your local device and publish to the channel respectively.

p.codeblock: virtual int selectMultiAudioTrack(int playoutTrackIndex, int publishTrackIndex) = 0;
Future<void> selectMultiAudioTrack( {required int playoutTrackIndex, required int publishTrackIndex});

section.title: Details
section.p: You can call this method to determine respectively the audio track to be played on your local device and published to the channel.
Before calling this method, you need to open the media file with the method and set enableMultiAudioTrack in as .

section.title: Applicable scenarios
section.p: For example, in KTV scenarios, the host can choose to play the original sound locally and publish the accompaniment track to the channel.

plentry.pd: The index of audio tracks for local playback. You can obtain the index through .
The index of audio tracks to be published in the channel. You can obtain the index through .

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; and you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.
